name: PropertiesListComponent

inputsClass.name: data
inputsClass.rawdescription: An object where the properties keys are resolved from.
inputsClass.description: An object where the properties keys are resolved from.

inputsClass.name: emptyLabel
inputsClass.rawdescription:
Set this label to display all properties but the empty ones
get the `emptyLabel` assigned. If the empty label is not set,
defaults to 'c8ydontshow' and it not rendered
inputsClass.description: Set this label to display all properties but the empty ones get the emptyLabel assigned. If the empty label is not set, defaults to 'c8ydontshow' and it not rendered

inputsClass.name: groups
inputsClass.rawdescription:
A string array of groups that are shown. If noParse is set to false,
each complex key will form a group.
inputsClass.description: A string array of groups that are shown. If noParse is set to false, each complex key will form a group.

inputsClass.name: icon
inputsClass.rawdescription: An icon which is displayed next to the title.
inputsClass.description: An icon which is displayed next to the title.

inputsClass.name: noParse
inputsClass.rawdescription:
The component tries to parse the properties and resolve keys and types. You can
avoid this by setting this property to true.
inputsClass.description: The component tries to parse the properties and resolve keys and types. You can avoid this by setting this property to true.

inputsClass.name: properties
inputsClass.rawdescription: The properties that this list should display.
inputsClass.description: The properties that this list should display.

methodsClass.name: hasGroup
methodsClass.rawdescription: Checks if a certain property has an group associated.
methodsClass.description: Checks if a certain property has an group associated.

description:
Renders a list of properties of an object.

Example :
<c8y-properties-list
  icon="info"
  [properties]="properties"
  [data]="options"
  [emptyLabel]="'-'"
  [title]="'Application properties' | translate"
></c8y-properties-list>
rawdescription:
Renders a list of properties of an object.

```html
<c8y-properties-list
  icon="info"
  [properties]="properties"
  [data]="options"
  [emptyLabel]="'-'"
  [title]="'Application properties' | translate"
></c8y-properties-list>
```
